allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Seedline youth soccer analytics platform

- React frontend (v49) with Vite build system
- Flask admin server for scraping and data management
- Python scrapers for ECNL, Girls Academy, ASPIRE, and NPL leagues
- PageRank-based team ranking algorithm (v42c)
- Player and team profile management
- Badge/award system
- User authentication with role-based access
- Club logo assets

Database and large data files excluded via .gitignore
EOF
)")
